name: Spacecraft OS 8
description:
-Gather energy and restart the space station.

-As you get closer to the space station, the energy move to the space station .

-Depending on your memory space, choose to turn the ship’s system on or off.

-The Info System will give you some information about the target.

-The Update System consumes the space station energy.

Update

v1.1

-Add some energy point at the beginning of the game.

-You can set the window size with mouse or maximize window.
